TopicTitle: Choose your super power, then have it trivialized

Articles.Content:
The black hole is so powerful, it sucks you up, too.

I want to be able to create a world where no one dies, and feels no pain and no suffering.

You want to. But it's impossible. Too bad.

The power to have any power and resist anything.

You want to. But it's impossible. Too bad.

The power to have any power and resist anything.

You overwhelm your will to live and die by your own hand.

I want unlimited funding for all my projects. Such as planning a moon colony, and all that.

You have so much money that all currencies values are lost.

I want to be able to make anyone happy.

You make yourself so happy you commit suicide (A little dark, but still...)

I wish I could fire a stable Wormhole opening from my tail

You suck up everyting ever known and not known to exists and live the rest of your life floating in nothing and nowhere.

I want to control the weather.

Your ability to cause storms causes widespread flooding, destroying your house.

I want the ability to telepathically punch anyone I want, like a person who talks trash about me on the internet.

Your ability to cause storms causes widespread flooding, destroying your house.

I want the ability to telepathically punch anyone I want, like a person who talks trash about me on the internet.

You talked trash about yourself while asleep and knocked yourself unconscious.

I want the power to change the mind of everyone, so I can force them to do stuff.

You change your mind, making you do what we tell you to do

I wish I had a laser inside my tail

You change your mind, making you do what we tell you to do

I wish I had a laser inside my tail

Good job, you now have a laser pointer in your tail. what were you thinking?

I want to have the powers of Danny2462!

You destroy yourself by dumping Jool on your head

I want to be invisible

You are also inaudible. Congrats in existing on a parallel plane of the universe.

I want to fly.

You fly into a wall.

I want to not die or experience pain and suffering, physically and emotionally.

Ã¢â„¢ÂªYou are a rock, you are an island.Ã¢â„¢Âª

I wish for the power of rock and roll.

You have a rock landing on your head and a boulder rolling towards you

I wish I could kill off Humanity by using my chainsaw to split Earth into 2 halves

Edited November 23, 2013 by 11JRidding
Spelling error: Corrected

You split a model of planet Earth with mini people on it

I can't edit and I forget my power :/

I wish I could simply walk into Mordor

Edited November 22, 2013 by Specialist290
Sequential posts merged.

granted, you fall into Mount Doom.

I wish I wasn't sick.

You are stupid, instead

I want to hug a dragon and NOT have it set me on fire

it eats you obviously

i wish i can breath fire

You toast yourself

I wish I could slice SKYSCRAPERS to pieces using my High-Frequency Chainsaw

You get squashed by a large bit of the building.

Flame-retardant sword that can control fire.

Granted ,but it doesn't make you flame retardant....

Having being powered by steam ,and being able to break through walls with my steel skeleton.

Granted, but being powered by steam you are prone to boiler explosions.

Being able to communicate telepathically with any creature.

You telepathically communicate with Kang and Kudos and tell them your weaknesses, then they kill you.

I want to be "in" a video game, if you know what I mean.

It's the "Matrix" situation, and the game you're in happens to be a bullet hell shooter.

You're dead IRL.

I want the ability to resist all poisons.
